snippet: President Demetris Christofias faced calls to resign on Monday after an inquiry accused him of negligence over a munitions blast in July that killed 13 people and destroyed the main power station.
lead_paragraph: President Demetris Christofias faced calls to resign on Monday after an inquiry accused him of negligence over a munitions blast in July that killed 13 people and destroyed the main power station.

headline.main: Cyprus: Inquiry Blames President for Explosion, Prompting Calls to Quit
headline.print_headline: Cyprus: Inquiry Blames President For Explosion, Prompting Calls to Quit
